results.title: Local Administration of Simvastatin Stimulates Healing of an Avascular Meniscus in a Rabbit Model of a Meniscal Defect.
results.text_hl: Several reports have shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ stimulates the anabolic activity of intervertebral fibrochondrocytes, suggesting that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may be used for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Osteochondritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010007 @@@meniscal defects@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang S, Matsushita T, Kuroda R, Nishida K, Matsuzaki T, Matsumoto T, Takayama K, Nagai K, Oka S, Tabata Y, Nagamune K, Kurosaka M. Local Administration of Simvastatin Stimulates Healing of an Avascular Meniscus in a Rabbit Model of a Meniscal Defect. Am J Sports Med. 2016 Jul;44(7):1735-43. PMID: 27159292
